bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of intractable and difficult to cure hui chong 蛔蟲② , roundworm, disease. Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry si ren chen ji xi 死人枕及席：石蛔者，醫療既癖，蛔蟲轉堅，世 間藥不能遣 , 所以須鬼物馳之，然後乃散，故令煮死人枕服 ”As for stone[like] roundworm , when medically treated it forms an aggregation-illness. The roundworms turn hard, and no medication on earth is able to eliminate them. This is why one must resort to demonic items to get it moving and then to have it dispersed. Hence [the patient] is ordered to prepare and ingest a decoction from a dead person’s headrest”.
